name: Circle Attack
description: This is my first ever game! It's quite a simple project, and I'm just making this for fun in my free time. This game takes place with you (the red dot) in a small arena. Within this arena, enemies spawn, flying around the entire map wildly and unpredictably. You must move your red dot with WASD, arrow keys, or even a joystick, and press SPACE to attack the enemies.
